query:
SELECT s.id, s.symbol, s.name, 
       COUNT(t.id) as trade_count,
       SUM(t.pnl) / 100 as total_pnl_dollars,
       MIN(t.pnl) / 100 as worst_trade_dollars,
       MAX(t.pnl) / 100 as best_trade_dollars,
       AVG(t.pnlPercent) / 10000 * 100 as avg_pnl_percent
FROM strategies s
LEFT JOIN trades t ON s.id = t.strategyId
WHERE s.symbol IN ('NQTrend', 'NQTrendLeveraged')
GROUP BY s.id, s.symbol, s.name;
